Text: What does it mean when you said that you cut 40 secs of line audio for security reasons?

@glangley, i think he means because of security reasons he had to cut around ~40secs of the audio (line).  As i understand it.  Hope that helps (please like and subscribe to show ur thanks for my in-depth deciphering for you)

@glangley,
It most likely means that these 40 seconds of audio have a tag on it to identify the source. It would not be audible, but if you copy the sound directly from the source, you can copy that security tag. This would then allow identification of where the movie came from, which could potentially get the maker into trouble.
